title: VOLTAGE ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION COORDINATOR
description:
Any business’s success comes from within: our facility managers’ extraordinary delight in detail ensures smooth workflows. They design and control all required daily processes, both on a small and a large scale. As an interface between individual areas, they optimize collaboration and thus contribute significantly to the success of the BMW Group.
